name: Memories (itch) (builtbybea)
description:
Memories is a short narrative game about objects that trigger memories.

This game was made part of Code Coven's Intro To Game Making Course

The game was inspired by Freebird Games "To The Moon" and "Finding Paradise"

Keyboard Controls

Start - Space

Up - Up Arrow / W   

Down - Down Arrow / S   

Left - Left Arrow / A   

Right - Right Arrow / D   

Interact with objects  - Space  

Assets used: https://limezu.itch.io/moderninteriors

Background: https://arludus.itch.io/pixel-art-backgrounds-10-sky-cloud

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/jrpg-pack-4-calm

Track 2. Childhood Friends

Track 3. Peaceful Days

Hope you enjoy 👾💕
